His weapon is designed for extreme range. The whole reason he's
dodging like every shot coming at him is that he sees it quite a while
before it hits him.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (If Incarcinator is over 5280 feet in the air, how is he firing at
Shockwave 
> who's only like 300 feet in the air?  That's about a 4000 ft
difference)
